events.name: EV Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_description: The supply chain of electric vehicle (EV) batteries involves several stages including upstream activities like mining for critical minerals, midstream activities like refining and manufacturing components, and downstream activities like battery assembly and recycling.
events.description: The supply chain of electric vehicle (EV) batteries involves several stages including upstream activities like mining for critical minerals, midstream activities like refining and manufacturing components, and downstream activities like battery assembly and recycling.

events.name: Upstream Activities
events.wd_description: Mining for raw materials such as cobalt, lithium, nickel, manganese, and graphite required for EV batteries, often concentrated in a small number of countries.
events.description: Mining for raw materials such as cobalt, lithium, nickel, manganese, and graphite required for EV batteries, often concentrated in a small number of countries.

events.name: Mining of Critical Minerals
events.wd_description: Extraction of critical minerals such as cobalt, lithium, and nickel, primarily in countries with extractivist economies like Australia, Chile, and the Democratic Republic of the Congo.
events.description: Extraction of critical minerals such as cobalt, lithium, and nickel, primarily in countries with extractivist economies like Australia, Chile, and the Democratic Republic of the Congo.

events.name: Environmental and Social Impacts
events.wd_description: Mining activities present dangers to nearby communities, including environmental degradation, low pay for miners, and health risks from contamination.
events.description: Mining activities present dangers to nearby communities, including environmental degradation, low pay for miners, and health risks from contamination.

events.name: Midstream Activities
events.wd_description: Refining and smelting of raw mineral ores, manufacturing of cathodes and anodes for battery cells, and other processing activities.
events.description: Refining and smelting of raw mineral ores, manufacturing of cathodes and anodes for battery cells, and other processing activities.

events.name: Refining and Smelting
events.wd_description: Processing of raw mineral ores with heat or chemical treatment to achieve high-purity materials required for batteries, largely dominated by China.
events.description: Processing of raw mineral ores with heat or chemical treatment to achieve high-purity materials required for batteries, largely dominated by China.

events.name: Cathode and Anode Manufacturing
events.wd_description: Production of cathodes and anodes, essential components of battery cells, involving various specialized processes.
events.description: Production of cathodes and anodes, essential components of battery cells, involving various specialized processes.

events.name: Downstream Activities
events.wd_description: Manufacturing of the batteries and end goods for the consumer, with a significant portion of production occurring in China.
events.description: Manufacturing of the batteries and end goods for the consumer, with a significant portion of production occurring in China.

events.name: Battery Manufacturing
events.wd_description: Assembly of battery cells into complete battery packs, with production emissions varying based on energy sources used.
events.description: Assembly of battery cells into complete battery packs, with production emissions varying based on energy sources used.

events.name: End-Product Assembly
events.wd_description: Final assembly of batteries into electric vehicles, ready for consumer use.
events.description: Final assembly of batteries into electric vehicles, ready for consumer use.

events.name: End-of-Life Activities
events.wd_description: Recycling or recovery of materials from spent batteries to reduce environmental impact and meet market demand for critical elements.
events.description: Recycling or recovery of materials from spent batteries to reduce environmental impact and meet market demand for critical elements.

events.name: Recycling Processes
events.wd_description: Various methods of recycling, including pyrometallurgy and hydrometallurgy, to recover critical materials from spent batteries.
events.description: Various methods of recycling, including pyrometallurgy and hydrometallurgy, to recover critical materials from spent batteries.

events.name: Disposal Impacts
events.wd_description: Environmental impacts of improper disposal of batteries, highlighting the importance of recycling to reduce greenhouse gas emissions and energy consumption.
events.description: Environmental impacts of improper disposal of batteries, highlighting the importance of recycling to reduce greenhouse gas emissions and energy consumption.

events.name: Global Market Dynamics
events.wd_description: The global market for EV batteries is influenced by factors such as demand for electric vehicles, supply chain security, and technological advancements.
events.description: The global market for EV batteries is influenced by factors such as demand for electric vehicles, supply chain security, and technological advancements.

events.name: Market Demand
events.wd_description: Increasing demand for electric vehicles drives the need for battery components, affecting the global market.
events.description: Increasing demand for electric vehicles drives the need for battery components, affecting the global market.

events.name: Growth in EV Sales
events.wd_description: Significant increase in electric vehicle sales, particularly in markets like China, contributing to higher demand for batteries.
events.description: Significant increase in electric vehicle sales, particularly in markets like China, contributing to higher demand for batteries.

events.name: Battery Storage Power Stations
events.wd_description: Expansion of battery storage power stations to support renewable energy transitions, further driving demand for battery components.
events.description: Expansion of battery storage power stations to support renewable energy transitions, further driving demand for battery components.

events.name: Supply Chain Security
events.wd_description: Ensuring a stable and secure supply chain for critical minerals is a major economic issue, involving strategies like recycling and technological advancements.
events.description: Ensuring a stable and secure supply chain for critical minerals is a major economic issue, involving strategies like recycling and technological advancements.

events.name: Recycling Initiatives
events.wd_description: Strategies to recycle battery materials to meet market demand and reduce environmental impacts.
events.description: Strategies to recycle battery materials to meet market demand and reduce environmental impacts.

events.name: Technological Advancements
events.wd_description: Innovations in battery technology to enhance efficiency, sustainability, and reduce dependency on raw materials.
events.description: Innovations in battery technology to enhance efficiency, sustainability, and reduce dependency on raw materials.

events.name: Technological Advancements
events.wd_description: Advances in battery technology, such as the development of LFP and sodium-ion batteries, aim to reduce the use of critical minerals and enhance sustainability.
events.description: Advances in battery technology, such as the development of LFP and sodium-ion batteries, aim to reduce the use of critical minerals and enhance sustainability.

events.name: LFP Technology
events.wd_description: Lithium iron phosphate (LFP) batteries, leading technology in China, are more sustainable and avoid the use of critical minerals like cobalt and nickel.
events.description: Lithium iron phosphate (LFP) batteries, leading technology in China, are more sustainable and avoid the use of critical minerals like cobalt and nickel.

events.name: Sustainability Benefits
events.wd_description: LFP batteries are more sustainable due to the absence of critical minerals and the ability to reduce environmental impacts.
events.description: LFP batteries are more sustainable due to the absence of critical minerals and the ability to reduce environmental impacts.

events.name: Market Adoption
events.wd_description: Widespread adoption of LFP batteries in China, capturing a significant share of the global battery market.
events.description: Widespread adoption of LFP batteries in China, capturing a significant share of the global battery market.

events.name: Sodium-Ion Technology
events.wd_description: Sodium-ion batteries, which completely avoid the need for critical minerals, offer a high potential for future adoption in the global market.
events.description: Sodium-ion batteries, which completely avoid the need for critical minerals, offer a high potential for future adoption in the global market.

events.name: Critical Mineral Avoidance
events.wd_description: Sodium-ion batteries eliminate the need for critical minerals like cobalt and nickel, making them more sustainable.
events.description: Sodium-ion batteries eliminate the need for critical minerals like cobalt and nickel, making them more sustainable.

events.name: Future Market Potential
events.wd_description: Sodium-ion batteries have a high potential for future adoption in the global market due to their sustainability advantages.
events.description: Sodium-ion batteries have a high potential for future adoption in the global market due to their sustainability advantages.

events.name: Environmental Justice and Human Rights Issues
events.wd_label: Environmental Justice and Human Rights Issues
events.wd_description: The extraction and processing of critical minerals for EV batteries raise significant environmental justice and human rights concerns, particularly in the Global South.
events.description: The extraction and processing of critical minerals for EV batteries raise significant environmental justice and human rights concerns, particularly in the Global South.

events.name: Human Rights Violations
events.wd_description: Mining activities for critical minerals often involve poor working conditions, low pay, and human rights abuses including child labor and violent treatment of miners.
events.description: Mining activities for critical minerals often involve poor working conditions, low pay, and human rights abuses including child labor and violent treatment of miners.

events.name: Poor Working Conditions
events.wd_description: Miners often face unsafe and hazardous working environments, with inadequate safety measures and low wages.
events.description: Miners often face unsafe and hazardous working environments, with inadequate safety measures and low wages.

events.name: Child Labor
events.wd_description: Use of child labor in mining operations, leading to exploitation and deprivation of education and safe childhood.
events.description: Use of child labor in mining operations, leading to exploitation and deprivation of education and safe childhood.

events.name: Violent Treatment
events.wd_description: Miners often face violent treatment and abuse in mining regions, exacerbating human rights violations.
events.description: Miners often face violent treatment and abuse in mining regions, exacerbating human rights violations.

events.name: Environmental Degradation
events.wd_description: Mining activities contribute to environmental degradation, impacting local communities' food and water quality and leading to long-term contamination.
events.description: Mining activities contribute to environmental degradation, impacting local communities' food and water quality and leading to long-term contamination.

events.name: Water Contamination
events.wd_description: Mining processes contaminate local water supplies, affecting the health and livelihood of nearby communities.
events.description: Mining processes contaminate local water supplies, affecting the health and livelihood of nearby communities.

events.name: Soil Degradation
events.wd_description: Mining operations lead to soil degradation, reducing agricultural productivity and impacting local food security.
events.description: Mining operations lead to soil degradation, reducing agricultural productivity and impacting local food security.

events.name: Long-term Contamination
events.wd_description: Persistent contamination from mining activities leads to generational health issues and environmental damage.
events.description: Persistent contamination from mining activities leads to generational health issues and environmental damage.

events.name: Economic Disparities
events.wd_description: The economic benefits of mining are often unevenly distributed, with local communities bearing the environmental costs while profits are reaped by distant entities.
events.description: The economic benefits of mining are often unevenly distributed, with local communities bearing the environmental costs while profits are reaped by distant entities.

events.name: Uneven Profit Distribution
events.wd_description: Profits from mining operations primarily benefit corporations and distant economies, not the local communities.
events.description: Profits from mining operations primarily benefit corporations and distant economies, not the local communities.

events.name: Local Economic Strain
events.wd_description: Local communities face economic strain due to environmental degradation and lack of investment from mining profits.
events.description: Local communities face economic strain due to environmental degradation and lack of investment from mining profits.

events.name: Recycling and End-of-Life Management
events.wd_description: Effective recycling and end-of-life management of EV batteries can provide significant social, economic, and environmental benefits, reducing dependency on raw materials and lowering greenhouse gas emissions.
events.description: Effective recycling and end-of-life management of EV batteries can provide significant social, economic, and environmental benefits, reducing dependency on raw materials and lowering greenhouse gas emissions.

events.name: Recycling Processes
events.wd_description: Various recycling processes, including pyrometallurgy and hydrometallurgy, are used to recover valuable materials from spent batteries.
events.description: Various recycling processes, including pyrometallurgy and hydrometallurgy, are used to recover valuable materials from spent batteries.

events.name: Pyrometallurgy
events.wd_description: A recycling method that employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into alloys such as cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel, though it is costly and environmentally intensive.
events.description: A recycling method that employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into alloys such as cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel, though it is costly and environmentally intensive.

events.name: Hydrometallurgy
events.wd_description: A recycling method involving aqueous solutions to leach metals from the cathode substance, highly effective but with a complex process and lengthy production time.
events.description: A recycling method involving aqueous solutions to leach metals from the cathode substance, highly effective but with a complex process and lengthy production time.

events.name: Direct Recycling
events.wd_description: Direct recycling of battery components to recover and reuse materials without extensive chemical processing, promising but less mature.
events.description: Direct recycling of battery components to recover and reuse materials without extensive chemical processing, promising but less mature.

events.name: End-of-Life Management Strategies
events.wd_description: Strategies for managing the end-of-life of EV batteries, including recycling, disposal, and recovery of valuable materials to minimize environmental impact.
events.description: Strategies for managing the end-of-life of EV batteries, including recycling, disposal, and recovery of valuable materials to minimize environmental impact.

events.name: Recycling Initiatives
events.wd_description: Efforts to increase the recycling rate of EV batteries to reduce environmental impact and meet market demand for critical materials.
events.description: Efforts to increase the recycling rate of EV batteries to reduce environmental impact and meet market demand for critical materials.

events.name: Disposal Techniques
events.wd_description: Methods for safely disposing of spent batteries to prevent environmental harm, emphasizing the importance of recycling over landfill disposal.
events.description: Methods for safely disposing of spent batteries to prevent environmental harm, emphasizing the importance of recycling over landfill disposal.

events.name: Material Recovery
events.wd_description: Processes to recover valuable materials from spent batteries, reducing the need for new raw materials and minimizing waste.
events.description: Processes to recover valuable materials from spent batteries, reducing the need for new raw materials and minimizing waste.

events.name: Manufacturing Dominance
events.wd_description: The manufacturing of battery technology and electric vehicles is largely dominated by China, with significant activities also in Japan and Korea.
events.description: The manufacturing of battery technology and electric vehicles is largely dominated by China, with significant activities also in Japan and Korea.

events.name: China Dominance
events.wd_description: China accounts for three-quarters of global lithium-ion battery production and dominates refining of critical minerals like lithium, cobalt, and graphite.
events.description: China accounts for three-quarters of global lithium-ion battery production and dominates refining of critical minerals like lithium, cobalt, and graphite.

events.name: Lithium-Ion Battery Production
events.wd_description: China's production capacity for lithium-ion batteries significantly surpasses other countries, driving its dominance in the global market.
events.description: China's production capacity for lithium-ion batteries significantly surpasses other countries, driving its dominance in the global market.

events.name: Mineral Refining
events.wd_description: China refines a major portion of the world's lithium, cobalt, and graphite, essential for battery production.
events.description: China refines a major portion of the world's lithium, cobalt, and graphite, essential for battery production.

events.name: Japan and Korea Activities
events.wd_description: Japan and Korea play significant roles in midstream cell manufacturing and downstream supply chain activities for batteries and electric vehicles.
events.description: Japan and Korea play significant roles in midstream cell manufacturing and downstream supply chain activities for batteries and electric vehicles.

events.name: Cell Manufacturing
events.wd_description: Japan and Korea host significant manufacturing facilities for battery cells, contributing to the global supply chain.
events.description: Japan and Korea host significant manufacturing facilities for battery cells, contributing to the global supply chain.

events.name: Supply Chain Activities
events.wd_description: Japan and Korea are involved in various supply chain activities, supporting the production and distribution of batteries and electric vehicles.
events.description: Japan and Korea are involved in various supply chain activities, supporting the production and distribution of batteries and electric vehicles.

events.name: Supply Chain Risks and Challenges
events.wd_description: The supply chain for EV batteries faces numerous risks and challenges, including geopolitical issues, extreme weather events, and rapid technological changes.
events.description: The supply chain for EV batteries faces numerous risks and challenges, including geopolitical issues, extreme weather events, and rapid technological changes.

events.name: Geopolitical Issues
events.wd_description: Political instability and corruption in countries with mineral deposits can disrupt the supply chain, impacting the availability of critical materials.
events.description: Political instability and corruption in countries with mineral deposits can disrupt the supply chain, impacting the availability of critical materials.

events.name: Political Instability
events.wd_description: Countries with significant mineral deposits often experience political instability, which can affect mining and export activities.
events.description: Countries with significant mineral deposits often experience political instability, which can affect mining and export activities.

events.name: Corruption
events.wd_description: Corruption in the mining sector can lead to inefficient practices and further destabilize the supply chain for critical minerals.
events.description: Corruption in the mining sector can lead to inefficient practices and further destabilize the supply chain for critical minerals.

events.name: Environmental Risks
events.wd_description: Extreme weather events and environmental degradation pose significant risks to the supply chain by disrupting mining and transportation of minerals.
events.description: Extreme weather events and environmental degradation pose significant risks to the supply chain by disrupting mining and transportation of minerals.

events.name: Extreme Weather Events
events.wd_description: Climate change-induced extreme weather events can disrupt mining operations and logistics, impacting the supply chain.
events.description: Climate change-induced extreme weather events can disrupt mining operations and logistics, impacting the supply chain.

events.name: Environmental Degradation
events.wd_description: Environmental degradation from mining activities can lead to long-term ecological damage, affecting the availability of minerals.
events.description: Environmental degradation from mining activities can lead to long-term ecological damage, affecting the availability of minerals.

events.name: Technological Changes
events.wd_description: Rapid advancements in battery technology can alter supply chain dynamics, requiring constant adaptation by suppliers and manufacturers.
events.description: Rapid advancements in battery technology can alter supply chain dynamics, requiring constant adaptation by suppliers and manufacturers.

events.name: Innovation in Battery Technology
events.wd_description: New technologies and improvements in battery design can shift demand for different materials, impacting the supply chain.
events.description: New technologies and improvements in battery design can shift demand for different materials, impacting the supply chain.

events.name: Supply Chain Adaptation
events.wd_description: Suppliers and manufacturers must adapt to technological changes to remain competitive and meet evolving market demands.
events.description: Suppliers and manufacturers must adapt to technological changes to remain competitive and meet evolving market demands.

events.name: Global Production and Sales
events.wd_description: The production and sales of electric vehicles are rapidly increasing worldwide, with significant contributions from China.
events.description: The production and sales of electric vehicles are rapidly increasing worldwide, with significant contributions from China.

events.name: Production Increase
events.wd_description: The production of electric vehicles has increased significantly, particularly in China, driven by technological advancements and government incentives.
events.description: The production of electric vehicles has increased significantly, particularly in China, driven by technological advancements and government incentives.

events.name: China Production
events.wd_description: China leads in the production of electric vehicles, with a significant increase in manufacturing capacity and output.
events.description: China leads in the production of electric vehicles, with a significant increase in manufacturing capacity and output.

events.name: Government Incentives
events.wd_description: Government policies and incentives in China have spurred the growth of the electric vehicle industry, increasing production rates.
events.description: Government policies and incentives in China have spurred the growth of the electric vehicle industry, increasing production rates.

events.name: Sales Growth
events.wd_description: Sales of electric vehicles have seen a significant increase globally, with China experiencing a substantial rise in EV sales.
events.description: Sales of electric vehicles have seen a significant increase globally, with China experiencing a substantial rise in EV sales.

events.name: China Sales
events.wd_description: China has experienced a substantial increase in electric vehicle sales, outpacing other regions.
events.description: China has experienced a substantial increase in electric vehicle sales, outpacing other regions.

events.name: Global Sales Trends
events.wd_description: The global market for electric vehicles is growing, with increasing consumer adoption and market penetration.
events.description: The global market for electric vehicles is growing, with increasing consumer adoption and market penetration.

events.name: Environmental Benefits of EV Adoption
events.wd_description: The adoption of electric vehicles offers significant environmental benefits by reducing the dependency on petroleum products and lowering greenhouse gas emissions.
events.description: The adoption of electric vehicles offers significant environmental benefits by reducing the dependency on petroleum products and lowering greenhouse gas emissions.

events.name: Reduction in Petroleum Use
events.wd_description: The widespread use of electric vehicles reduces the consumption of petroleum products, primarily used in conventional vehicles.
events.description: The widespread use of electric vehicles reduces the consumption of petroleum products, primarily used in conventional vehicles.

events.name: Lower Demand for Petroleum
events.wd_description: As electric vehicles become more prevalent, the demand for petroleum products decreases, leading to a shift in energy consumption patterns.
events.description: As electric vehicles become more prevalent, the demand for petroleum products decreases, leading to a shift in energy consumption patterns.

events.name: Reduction in Oil Industry Impact
events.wd_description: Reduced reliance on petroleum for vehicles diminishes the environmental impact of the oil industry, including extraction, refining, and emissions.
events.description: Reduced reliance on petroleum for vehicles diminishes the environmental impact of the oil industry, including extraction, refining, and emissions.

events.name: Lower Greenhouse Gas Emissions
events.wd_description: The shift to electric vehicles contributes to lower greenhouse gas emissions compared to conventional vehicles powered by fossil fuels.
events.description: The shift to electric vehicles contributes to lower greenhouse gas emissions compared to conventional vehicles powered by fossil fuels.

events.name: Emissions Reduction
events.wd_description: Electric vehicles produce fewer greenhouse gas emissions during operation compared to conventional internal combustion engine vehicles.
events.description: Electric vehicles produce fewer greenhouse gas emissions during operation compared to conventional internal combustion engine vehicles.

events.name: Climate Change Mitigation
events.wd_description: The reduction in greenhouse gas emissions from electric vehicles contributes to global efforts to mitigate climate change.
events.description: The reduction in greenhouse gas emissions from electric vehicles contributes to global efforts to mitigate climate change.

events.name: Strategies for Supply Chain Resilience
events.wd_description: To address the various challenges in the EV battery supply chain, several strategies are being implemented to enhance resilience and sustainability.
events.description: To address the various challenges in the EV battery supply chain, several strategies are being implemented to enhance resilience and sustainability.

events.name: Diversification of Supply Sources
events.wd_description: Diversifying the sources of critical minerals and materials is a key strategy to reduce dependency on a few countries and ensure a stable supply chain.
events.description: Diversifying the sources of critical minerals and materials is a key strategy to reduce dependency on a few countries and ensure a stable supply chain.

events.name: New Mining Operations
events.wd_description: Developing new mining operations in different regions to access untapped mineral resources and reduce geographical concentration risks.
events.description: Developing new mining operations in different regions to access untapped mineral resources and reduce geographical concentration risks.

events.name: Strategic Partnerships
events.wd_description: Forming strategic partnerships with countries and companies to secure long-term supply agreements for critical minerals.
events.description: Forming strategic partnerships with countries and companies to secure long-term supply agreements for critical minerals.

events.name: Investment in Recycling
events.wd_description: Increasing investments in recycling infrastructure and technologies to recover critical materials from spent batteries and reduce the demand for new raw materials.
events.description: Increasing investments in recycling infrastructure and technologies to recover critical materials from spent batteries and reduce the demand for new raw materials.

events.name: Advanced Recycling Technologies
events.wd_description: Developing and implementing advanced recycling technologies to efficiently recover valuable materials from used batteries.
events.description: Developing and implementing advanced recycling technologies to efficiently recover valuable materials from used batteries.

events.name: Recycling Infrastructure Development
events.wd_description: Building and expanding recycling facilities and infrastructure to support large-scale recycling efforts for EV batteries.
events.description: Building and expanding recycling facilities and infrastructure to support large-scale recycling efforts for EV batteries.

events.name: Technological Innovation
events.wd_description: Promoting technological innovations in battery design and manufacturing processes to improve efficiency, reduce costs, and enhance sustainability.
events.description: Promoting technological innovations in battery design and manufacturing processes to improve efficiency, reduce costs, and enhance sustainability.

events.name: Research and Development
events.wd_description: Investing in research and development to drive innovations in battery technology, aiming for higher performance and sustainability.
events.description: Investing in research and development to drive innovations in battery technology, aiming for higher performance and sustainability.

events.name: Sustainable Manufacturing Practices
events.wd_description: Implementing sustainable manufacturing practices to reduce the environmental footprint of battery production and enhance resource efficiency.
events.description: Implementing sustainable manufacturing practices to reduce the environmental footprint of battery production and enhance resource efficiency.
